document_data.name: Jamal al-Karim
document_data.mainbody: '''Jamal al-Karim''' was a [[half-elven]] member of the [[House of Al-Karim]] living in the desert outside of [[Hiyal]] around [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}{{Cite card/AD&D Trading Cards/1993|84|[[Alia al-Karim]]}}
document_data.Activities: Jamal's encounter with a wealthy merchant named [[Farid]] quickly turned south and ended in his death at the merchant's hands, sparking a blood feud between his tribe and the merchant.
document_data.Relationships: Jamal was the son of [[Aasim Karim]], the leader of the tribe. His sister [[Alia al-Karim]] swore vengeance for his death.
